description: Location neighborhood classification - strongest predictor of daily cup performance
derivation_source: Correlation analysis: university_tourist=660cups vs residential=139cups across 8 stores
scoring_tiers: university_tourist=35; commercial_transit_hub=30; tourist_ethnic_enclave=26; financial_office=20; residential_mixed=10; residential=5

description: Number of subway lines within walking distance - amplifies foot traffic
derivation_source: All stores: subway amplifies good locations but cannot save bad ones (15th&3rd: 8 lines but 139 cups)

description: Balance of weekday vs weekend traffic - measures revenue sustainability
derivation_source: 8th&Broadway (55% weekday) outperforms 100 Maiden (72% weekday) due to weekend tourist traffic

description: Proximity penalty for distance to nearest existing Luckin store
derivation_source: 100 Maiden Ln (273cups) vs 102 Fulton (417cups) only 0.2mi apart shows cannibalization impact

description: Monthly rent efficiency relative to budget - lower rent at same quality scores higher
derivation_source: Budget constraint: $20K/month. Breakeven at 290 cups/day. Lower rent = faster breakeven
